title: (x) Rocco Italian Restaurant website header - Nevison, ITC Edwardian Script {Marcelo Rodi}
content:
[www.roccorestaurant.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20111211234335/http:/www.roccorestaurant.co.uk/ "www.roccorestaurant.co.uk")

the main font used for the scripted text- thought it was harmonica.. but that seems to be close-but-no-cigar...

any advice??

cheers in advance

Paul
author: gypetto
